app_detail:
Messenger for Text, free texting app with new Emoji, Stickers, Gifs is here for you now! As a best choice to take place default SMS app, Messenger text app is more than convenient, effective and totally free messenger app. We have emoji, gif, private box and customize wallpaper & bubble and many more unique features waiting for you to explore while messaging. Fully customize by you! Enjoy the most amazing texting experience.

In our text app, you can find:
â˜ºï¸ EMOJI ART & ANIMATED GIF :
3000+ emoji, like Emoji One. Animated Gif will bring more fun while you sending a text message. Text can never be so vivid and creative by sharing tons of trending hot GIFs via MMS & MMS
ğŸ“¬ PRIVATE BOX: 
Private box will encrypt your content from being seen. Even further, you can hide private boxâ€™s icon to put all messages or contacts privately. Text can never be so safe.
ğŸ–¼ï¸ CUSTOMIZED LAYOUT: 
You can customize almost everything you want: choose your own photo from gallery or take photos as your wallpaper, change bubble color and bubble style as you like, adjust text color, text font even font size. Text can never be so comfortable.
ğŸ”’ BACKUP & RESTORE : 
Backup MMS & SMS messages to your phone or cloud to keep messages from being lost. And if you delete wrong sms, our Messenger texting app can restore them if you backup them before.
ğŸ›¡ï¸ BLOCKER: 
Feeling exhausted about spam bombs? Messenger texting app will divide them from those important SMS as you put them in blocker. Just one click to add those messages to SMS blocker.
ğŸš— DRIVING MODE & AUTO REPLY: 
Once driving mode is on, all message notifications from Messenger texting app will be disabled and auto play to keep you away from distractions. Keep all your trip from being disturbed.
ğŸ“‹ SMS COLLECTION: 
Like, romantic SMS, flirt SMS, Love SMS, greeting SMS, friendship SMS, you can use 10+ categories SMS messages.
ğŸ’¬ SCHEDULE SMS: 
Set a schedule for your messages. Delay your important messages â€”â€” an opportunity to correct wrong messages.
âŒš ANDROID WEAR COMPATIBLE: 
Messenger for Text-New Emoji, Stickers, Gifs performs perfectly on Android Wear. Try Messenger texting app on your android wear!

MORE FEATURES
âˆš Copy and paste text messages easily.
âˆš Quick view and reply in pop up window.
âˆš Send your own signature for each messages.
âˆš All of messages support to send in group.
âˆš Quick search messages history.

â¤Contact Us
Email: smscontactteam@gmail.com
Appreciate for your support.
